TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Document extends Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.TextDocument

Docs.summary: Represents a source code document that is part of a project. It provides access to the source text, parsed syntax tree and the corresponding semantic model.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableArray`1<class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.DocumentId> GetLinkedDocumentIds() cil managed
Public Function GetLinkedDocumentIds () As ImmutableArray(Of DocumentId)

Docs.summary: Gets the list of s that are linked to this . s are considered to be linked if they share the same . This is excluded from the result.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Options.DocumentOptionSet> GetOptionsAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Function GetOptionsAsync (Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of DocumentOptionSet)

Docs.summary: Returns the options that should be applied to this document. This consists of global options from , merged with any settings the user has specified at the document levels.
Docs.remarks: This method is async because this may require reading other files. In files that are already open, this is expected to be cheap and complete synchronously.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SemanticModel> GetSemanticModelAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Function GetSemanticModelAsync (Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of SemanticModel)

Docs.summary: Gets the semantic model for this document asynchronously.
Docs.returns: The returned may be if returns . This function will return the same value if called multiple times.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxNode> GetSyntaxRootAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Function GetSyntaxRootAsync (Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of SyntaxNode)

Docs.summary: Gets the root node of the syntax tree asynchronously.
Docs.returns: The returned will be if returns . This function will return the same value if called multiple times.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxTree> GetSyntaxTreeAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Function GetSyntaxTreeAsync (Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of SyntaxTree)

Docs.summary: Gets the for this document asynchronously.
Docs.returns: The returned syntax tree can be if the returns . This function may cause computation to occur the first time it is called, but will return a cached result every subsequent time. 's can hold onto their roots lazily. So calls to or may end up causing computation to occur at that point.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VersionStamp> GetSyntaxVersionAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Function GetSyntaxVersionAsync (Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of VersionStamp)

Docs.summary: Gets the version of the syntax tree. This is generally the newer of the text version and the project's version.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Text.TextChange>> GetTextChangesAsync (Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Document oldDocument, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Text.TextChange>> GetTextChangesAsync(class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Document oldDocument, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Function GetTextChangesAsync (oldDocument As Document, Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of IEnumerable(Of TextChange))

Docs.summary: Get the text changes between this document and a prior version of the same document. The changes, when applied to the text of the old document, will produce the text of the current document.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::CodeAnalysis::SourceCodeKind SourceCodeKind { Microsoft::CodeAnalysis::SourceCodeKind get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property SourceCodeKind As SourceCodeKind

Docs.summary: The kind of source code this document contains.

Docs.summary:
if this Document supports providing data through the method.
If then that method will return instead.

Docs.summary:
if this Document supports providing data through the and methods.
If then these methods will return instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetSemanticModel([out] class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SemanticModel& semanticModel) cil managed
Public Function TryGetSemanticModel (ByRef semanticModel As SemanticModel) As Boolean

Docs.summary: Gets the current semantic model for this document if the model is already computed and still cached. In almost all cases, you should call , which will compute the semantic model if necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetSyntaxRoot([out] class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxNode& root) cil managed
Public Function TryGetSyntaxRoot (ByRef root As SyntaxNode) As Boolean

Docs.summary: Gets the root node of the current syntax tree if the syntax tree has already been parsed and the tree is still cached. In almost all cases, you should call to fetch the root node, which will parse the document if necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetSyntaxTree([out] class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxTree& syntaxTree) cil managed
Public Function TryGetSyntaxTree (ByRef syntaxTree As SyntaxTree) As Boolean

Docs.summary: Get the current syntax tree for the document if the text is already loaded and the tree is already parsed. In almost all cases, you should call to fetch the tree, which will parse the tree if it's not already parsed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetSyntaxVersion([out] valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VersionStamp& version) cil managed
Public Function TryGetSyntaxVersion (ByRef version As VersionStamp) As Boolean

Docs.summary: Get the current syntax tree version for the document if the text is already loaded and the tree is already parsed. In almost all cases, you should call to fetch the version, which will load the tree if it's not already available.

Public Function WithFilePath (filePath As String) As Document

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of this document updated to have the specified file path.
